title: Withdraw a fixed price offer
description: Withdraws an offer that is current and not expired, accepted or rejected by all users.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing that is being withdrawn, relisted or extended.

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description: Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the Listing field.

returns.description: <FixedPriceOfferResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Code
fields.description:
The result code of the offer response.

                                This field is always zero.  Do not use.
